markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Athletic Might](/Feats.aspx?ID=1287) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Surviving in hostile terrain has given you a great talent for mobility. Whenever you roll a success on an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) or [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39), you get a critical success instead.
name: Athletic Might
